contexts.context: ...center of the camp, the eldest and most powerful brother <mark>Airen</mark> Coribael was holding Lady Genevrah personally. Each of his brothers...

...The young adventurer quailed at the prospect of doing battle with <mark>Airen</mark> Coribael, the swiftest, strongest, sturdiest, and most...
Baranat walked calmly into the camp and began battle with <mark>Airen</mark> Coribael. The fight lasted seven days, and for six...
...The fight lasted seven days, and for six of them, <mark>Airen</mark> had the upper hand. He rained kicks and punches down...
...old Redguard fighting style he had begun on day one. <mark>Airen</mark> Coribael breathed no more.
